name: Contract.legalState
title: Contract.legalState
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.definition: Legal states of the formation of a legal instrument, which is a formally executed written document that can be formally attributed to its author, records and formally expresses a legally enforceable act, process, or contractual duty, obligation, or right, and therefore evidences that act, process, or agreement.
element.requirements: The legal state of a contract follows a prescribed flow as defined by the legal community and these state may be indepenedent of the workflow state.

binding.description: Detailed codes for the legal state of a contract.
